greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Array of coefficients of P(n,x) = det (M(n,x)) where M(n,x) is the n X n matrix m(i,j)=x if i>j m(i,j)=1-x if i<=j.
comment: Formatted as a triangular array, this is [1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...] DELTA [ -1, -1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...] (see construction in A084938). - _Philippe Deléham_, Aug 09 2005
maple: A079628 := proc(n,k) local x; expand((-1)^n* (x-1)*(2*x-1)^(n-1)) ;coeftayl(%,x=0,k) ; end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 04 2011
xref: Cf. A167580 and A167591. - _Johannes W. Meijer_, Nov 23 2009
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 30 2003
ext: Sign added to formula. - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 04 2011
